subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Nets led the Timberwolves by as many as 17 points in the first half but saw their advantage waste away to 7 in the third quarter before they regained their poise.
snippet: The Nets led the Timberwolves by as many as 17 points in the first half but saw their advantage waste away to 7 in the third quarter before they regained their poise.
